entry.title: Review - Stuart Little 2 (PS1)
entry.summary: It’s 6 levels that’ll take you about 20 minutes each to understand each and collect everything, concluded by a lacklustre boss. Inoffensive until it ends. entry.title: Review - XIII (PC)

entry.title: Review - Illusion of Gaia (SNES)
entry.summary: A solid 12-hour adventure with various developments both in environments and story, albeit with unexpectedly difficult bosses and a bit of a confusing ending.
